title: My friends client keep crashing during champ select any advice?
body:
Anyone going through similar problems?

He often crashes his client before champ select ends. It's starting to cause problems when we do ranked together. Any advice is appreciated.

replies.body:
He often gets messages about Pvp kernel not responding or Lol client has stopped responding, but never bug splats.

I don't think its a connection problem because his curse voice never disconnects.

He also never crashes one the games actually start.

Even though internet might seems fine elsewhere, it doesn't rule out an issue establishing a connection to our servers.  That said, the Kernel error you're referring to is usually a permissions issue.  The game needs to access files, but may result in that error when blocked.  In addition to our connection guide, ask him to perform the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) article so his game files will be allowed access.  That should get him squared away!
He also told me the crashing often occurs when he tabs out of the client. For now we are avoiding tabbing out until after he locks in his character

Based on the information provided here, your friend might be having a network issue that's causing him to lose sync and disconnect from champion select.  Have him go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guides for a list of steps to get this fixed up.  Hope that helps!
